About.title: Where comedy meets cocktails in Valencia
About.tagline: Premium cocktails, five draft beers, tapas at good prices and nights full of shows, karaoke and stand-up since 2025.
About.intro: La Comedia is a cozy stand-up and nightlife bar on C. de Campoamor 59 in Valencia. We serve premium cocktails, five draft beers from the barrel, tapas at friendly prices and a calendar full of good times.
About.highlight1: Signature cocktails mixed with top-shelf spirits.
About.highlight2: Five rotating beers on tap, always cold and fresh.
About.highlight3: Tapas at good prices to share between laughs.
About.highlight4: A warm local crowd, good music and a chilled atmosphere.
About.nightsText: Every Friday and Saturday from 20:00 to 01:30 we host our famous karaoke nights: pay 5€ once and sing as many songs as you want. No pressure, just music, laughter and applause.
About.nightsList1: Stand-up comedy nights with local and guest comedians.
About.nightsList2: Open mics for new voices, experiments and first-time performers.
About.nightsList3: Private parties, company events and birthdays you can fully customize.
About.nightsList4: Special themed nights, brand activations and more surprises.
About.collabText: If you are a comedian, musician, host, or you want to rent La Comedia for a private event, we’d love to hear from you.
About.cta: Contact us about performing or booking
